content: fun fun fun use a simple slipped stitch repeat to create these delectably dotty spotty socks choose two shades of paintbox socks yarn to knit these beauties that are spotty on the top and striped underneath the foot use a long circular and magic loop or dpns - whichever you prefer sizes to fit foot circumference 20 21 ½ 22 ½ 24 25 cm 8 8 ½ 9 9 ½ 10 in finished foot circumference 18 19 ½ 20 ½ 22 23 cm 7 7 ½ 8 8 ¼ 9 in intended to be worn with 2cm of negative ease you will need 100g balls of paintbox yarns socks as seen on cover 1 × a - pixel newsprint 1 × b - stripes rainbow set of 5 x 2 ¼mm uk 13 - us 1 double pointed needles optional for cuffs set of 5 x 2 ½mm uk 12 us 1 ½ double pointed or 60-80cm/24-32in circular needles
